page.title: 05Post Office,Church Street.
page.content: The{post office}is a very important shop to Steeple Bumpstead as it is not only a post office but a general store as well,selling sweets,toys and china. Opening hours:8:45am-5:30 except for Wednesday and Saturday when they close at 12:30.{Mr Drapkin}and Mrs Archer usually work 24 hours a week but Mrs Hayes only works 10 hours.The post office gets its stocks from the head office in Cambridge.Their busiest day is thursday,that is when most people collect their pensions. {The Butcher's shop}is also in Church Street.He works 5 days a week and opens at 8:30.He gets his stocks from whole salers in Great Dunmow.He sells mostly sausages, mince and chops. His busiest days are Friday and Saturday. He is called Bob Freestone and he thinks it useful to have a village butcher for a choice of fresh meat.
